overview: Nikki calls her girlfriends over for some quality time together and some gossip. She informs her friends that her sons girlfriend has moved into her house and has not paid any rent. Nikki is tired of watching Emma walk around like a little slut and has her girls strap up and take the rent money out of Emma's ass. Sheena Ryder invites her girls over for a toy party and some drinks. They start to try some of the toys out but her neighbor Alice is not happy with all of the strange noises coming from the house next door. Alice decides to take matters into her own hands and ask the girls if they could keep it down. Little does she know she just knocked on the wrong door. She gets pulled into the house and the ladies have their way with this nosy neighbor Ream Team style.
tagline: Are you ready for some awesome action? Here comes The Ream Team!!!
title: The Ream Team
